categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic droids

nodes.text: R2-T7 was the R2-series astromech droid that served onboard Red Five Grizz Frix's X-wing starfighter during the Battle of Endor, in which the droid was destroyed along with Frix and his fighter.

R2-T7 was created by Hasbro for a set of Star Wars: The Vintage Collection action figures based on the Battle of Endor. Frix's droid can be partially seen behind him in Return of the Jedi, though it does not match Hasbro's action figure of R2-T7, being a white-domed R5-series astromech droid.
